Name: WordOrder.binned5
Description: Dominant word order of subject, object and verb in a transitive clause, following definitions in Sinnemäki 2010.

Name: WordOrder.SO
Description: Dominant word order of subject and object in a transitive clause, following definitions in Sinnemäki 2010.

Name: WordOrder.binned7
Description: Dominant word order of subject, object and verb in a transitive clause, following definitions in Dryer 2013.

Name: WordOrder.S_first
Description: Dominant word order of subject compared to object and verb in a transitive clause,  following definitions in Sinnemäki 2010.

Name: MorphMarking
Description: Is there any overt morphological marking of lexical arguments (subject or object), including dependent marking (~case marking), head marking (~agreement), or some other consistent type of morphological marking? Definitions are as in Sinnemäki 2010.

Name: HeadMarking
Description: Is there any head marking of lexical arguments, mostly covering person, number, and gender agreement of a lexical subject and/or object on the predicate. Definitions are as in Sinnemäki 2010.

Name: DependentMarking
Description: Is there any dependent marking of lexical arguments, mostly covering case marking of the lexical subject and/or object. Definitions are as in Sinnemäki 2010.
